constructor.details: Only set _wrappedNativeAsset if the asset adheres to IWETH.deposit()

returns.isClosed_: True if the loan is closed

params._actionData: Encoded data to execute the action

repay(uint256).details: Anybody can repay. It is possible to pay more than the max loan balance. Users wanting to pay the exact loan balance should use `_amount = type(uint256).max`. As this function call comes directly from an end user, it does not pass through architecture to add the loan asset as a trackedAsset of the VaultProxy. Asset managers should make sure to always track the loan asset.

getDebtAssets().notice: Retrieves the debt assets (negative value) of the external position

getManagedAssets().notice: Retrieves the managed assets (positive value) of the external position

loanIsClosed().notice: Checks whether the loan is closed

receiveCallFromVault(bytes).notice: Receives and executes a call from the Vault

documentation.text: @dev Only set _wrappedNativeAsset if the asset adheres to IWETH.deposit()
@notice Initializes the external position

@notice Receives and executes a call from the Vault
 @param _actionData Encoded data to execute the action

@dev Helper to execute Action.CallOnAccountingModule.
 Allows for arbitrary actions within the accounting module.
@dev Helper to execute Action.ConfigureLoan

@dev Helper to execute Action.Reconcile.
 See notes for __reconcile().
@dev Helper to execute Action.UpdateBorrowableAmount

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "__reconcile: Extra assets contains loan asset"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "__reconcile: Extra assets contains loan asset"

documentation.text: @dev Helper to update the borrowable amount
@dev Helper to update the total repaid amount

@notice Borrows a specified amount
 @param _amount The amount to borrow

@notice Gets the accounting module used
 @return accountingModule_ The accounting module address

@notice Gets the borrowable amount
 @return borrowableAmount_ The borrowable amount

@notice Gets the loan borrower
 @return borrower_ The borrower

@notice Gets the loaned asset
 @return asset_ The asset

@notice Gets the total amount borrowed
 @return totalBorrowed_ The total amount borrowed

@notice Gets the total amount repaid
 @return totalRepaid_ The total amount repaid

@notice Checks whether the loan is closed
 @return isClosed_ True if the loan is closed
